net.minecraftforge.debug.client.model

Class ModelLoaderRegistryTest.OBJVertexColoring1

  • java.lang.Object
    • Block
      • net.minecraftforge.debug.client.model.ModelLoaderRegistryTest.OBJVertexColoring1
  • Enclosing class:
    ModelLoaderRegistryTest

    public static class ModelLoaderRegistryTest.OBJVertexColoring1
extends Block
    This block demonstrates how to utilize the vertex coloring feature of the OBJ loader. See 'vertex_coloring.obj' and 'vertex_coloring.mtl' in 'test/resources/assets/forgedebugmodelloaderregistry/models/block/', to properly utilize this feature an obj file must have 1 'usemtl' key before every vertex as shown, having less 'usemtl' lines than 'v' lines will result in the faces having that material's color instead of each vertex.
